From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>

Sorry for forgetting to reply to you, Alloran.

* Iron Raptor looked up from the intercom as she heard a voice, her eyes 
falling upon Chromedome and her annoyed expression disappearing completely.
She shook her leg roughly and slipped it out of Snow Tech's grasp, standing 
straight but listening carefully to Chromedome.
She wouldn't admit it but if her flesh had been any paler someone could have 
seen her blush slightly from the compliments which he was saying about her.
It was nice to have someone say something good about her after Liono's 
sayings. But she knew that she wasn't as good as they said she was.
She had been away while her beast mode had taken controle, and she had only 
returned while the battle had happened. A real leader wouldn't do that.
But people learned from the past and she had.*

" Well, I don't know if I'm as great as all that but your offer sounds 
pretty good to me. The more skilled warriors we have the better."

* Iron Raptor held out a hand.*

" I accept."
